newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Petronas Malacca refinery to shut for maintenance.
newsitem.headline: Petronas Malacca refinery to shut for maintenance.

text.p: Malaysian state-owned Petroliam Nasional Bhd (Petronas) plans to shut its 100,000 barrel-per-day (bpd) refinery in Malacca for maintenance from December 1-10, an official source said on Tuesday.
